game.ai.shared.player

Class PairsPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.shared.player.PairsPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PairsPlayerSpecification

    public class PairsPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PairsPlayerSpecification
    This class is an implementation of PairsPlayerSpecification
    Two IPlayer will play until IBoard.getGameState() is over
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PairsPlayer(IPlayer first, IPlayer second)
      Instead of randomly choosing the value for PairsPlayerSpecification
      I made the decision that PlayerState.CROSS will be assigned for the first IPlayer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addController(IGameController controller)
      Register itself with IGameController
      IPlayer getFirstPlayer()
      Return the first player of PairsPlayerSpecification
      PlayerState getRandomPlayerState()
      Assign randomly PlayerState.CROSS or PlayerState.NOUGHT for the current IPlayer
      IPlayer getSecondPlayer()
      Return the second IPlayer of PairsPlayerSpecification
      void play(IBoard board)
      IBoard will add PairsPlayerSpecification to observer list
